confirmed.description: Date+time subscriber confirmed his/her list opt-in

customfields.description: Dictionnary of field key to value

ip.description: Subscriber's IP address when he/she confirmed list opt-in

status.description:
Status (
  1- Active,
  2- Unconfirmed,
  3- Unsubscribed,
  4- Deleted,
  5- Cleaned because of hard bounce or spam complaint)
